div.h2: AS 5017-2006 Health Care Client Identifier Sex to FHIR administrative-gender
div.p: The AS 5017-2006 Health Care Client Identifier Sex to FHIR administrative-gender concept map defines relationships from the concepts in the AS 5017-2006 Health Care Client Identifier Sex code system (contextualised as the implicit value set of all its codes) to concepts in the FHIR administrative-gender value set.

title.value: AS 5017-2006 Health Care Client Identifier Sex to FHIR administrative-gender

description.value: The AS 5017-2006 Health Care Client Identifier Sex to FHIR administrative-gender concept map defines relationships from the concepts in the AS 5017-2006 Health Care Client Identifier Sex code system (contextualised as the implicit value set of all its codes) to concepts in the FHIR administrative-gender value set.
